EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_ContactLabs.New Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for your interest in Pivotal Labs. Your request for more information has been passed onto the team. We will get back to you soon. In the meantime, we invite you to continue exploring our website <http://www.pivotallabs.com> to see what extraordinary things we're up to.
- The Pivotal Labs team
